strapiEvent.name: Free Exhibition Game - Arkansas Soccer
strapiEvent.description:
Arkansas Soccer plays its final exhibition match against SIUE at Razorback Field this Saturday, Aug 12, at 6p. Fans get in free for a chance to see the team in action before the season begins.

  • Ranked: For the second-straight year, Arkansas Soccer will begin the season ranked No. 8 in the United Soccer Coaches poll â€” the fourth consecutive season the Hogs have been ranked in the top 15. Head coach Colby Hale led the team to an impressive Elite 8 appearance last season, finishing eighth in the nation.
  • Kick-Off: The regular season begins at Razorback Field on Aug 17 at 6:30p as Arkansas takes on Arkansas State for the start of what is sure to be another thrilling season.

Keep up with Arkansas Razorback Soccer HERE.
